library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(mvabund)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(vegan)
library(pander)

source("../R.scripts/read_clean_data.R")
source("../R.scripts/HabitatSizeFunctions.R")


## select abundances
abds_initial <- InsectZooBactAbds(SampleTime = "initial")
abds_final <- InsectZooBactAbds(SampleTime = "final")

perm_initial <- lapply(abds_initial, CommunityAdonis, 
                       testclass = "ExpAbd", fun = AdonisData, .strata = NULL)
perm_final <- lapply(abds_final, CommunityAdonis, 
                     testclass = "ExpAbd", fun = AdonisData, .strata = NULL)

lapply(perm_initial, CommunityAdonis, testclass = "adonis", 
       function(x) adonisValueExtract(x, RESP = "R2"))


Q
plotter("F.Model")

plotter("Pr(>F)")

plotter("R2")
